```{r}
library(knitr)

source("maxima.R")
knit_engines$set(maxima = maxima)
```

```{maxima, eval = FALSE}
f(x) := (x^2 + exp(x^2));
'f(2) = f(2);
J = jacobian([alpha / (alpha + beta), 1 / sqrt(alpha + beta)], [alpha, beta]);
det(J) = determinant(%);
```
which can be simplified to 

```{maxima}
factor(determinant(jacobian([alpha / (alpha + beta), 1 / sqrt(alpha + beta)], [alpha, beta])));
```
